features_en: Inchthornis - seabird with a huge beak
Primates have hands instead front legs and trunk instead thorax.
Ichthyostega - first animal moved from water to the ground and it has a tongue!
Black Dragon with 2 front legs, 2 back legs and 2 wings
Lots of attributes (not yet finished at all)
next_en: New Class, BodySegment and New species (Warrior Penguin).
notes_en: If You like to think attributes as D&D/RQ/UGE divide them by 1000.
